Explore Investor Programs and Incentives

Discover opportunities by industry and federal agency to help investors establish in the United States.

Investment Assistance

Connect with experts in your industry for individual counseling and best practices in market. Avoid costly regulatory road blocks or barriers and ensure that your investment is with the best possible partners.

Connect and collaborate with experts on investment topics.

Register for Investment Events

SelectUSA Brazil Road Show takes place December 1 - 4, 2015 and gives participants an opportunity to meet with pre-screened Brazilian investors and present your location to investors in Rio de Janeiro, Sao Paulo, and Belo Horizonte.

Get Advice and Support

SelectUSA services help facilitate, accelerate, and retain business investment in the United States. Expertise is available to investing firms and destinations, well as U.S. state, local or regional governments or economic development organizations.

Register

The United States is the premier location for new business investment. Flows of foreign direct investment to the United States and its territories rose from $160 billion in 2012 to $187.5 billion in 2013, according to statistics gathered by the U.S. Department of Commerce.

Register with us to access to a wealth of information, counseling, and resources from multiple U.S. Government agencies on doing business in the United States.

National Aerospace FDI Expo

Oct 26-28, 2015
